allow him a mo- ment's peace! Here, Pierre, tell them your opinion," said she, turning to the young man who, having come quite close, was gazing with astonishment at the angry face of the princess which had lost all dignity, and at the twitch- ing cheeks of Prince Vasili. 
"Remember that you will answer for the con- sequences," said Prince Vasili severely. "You don't know what you are doing." 
"Vile woman!" shouted the princess, dart- ing unexpectedly at Anna Mikhdylovna and
